source: TEXT_LUCKBC003_03212_SEQ_00<tab>Curious Gorge is training here, but his mind is elsewhere.
target: TEXT_LUCKBC003_03212_SEQ_00<tab>Quelque chose a l'air de tracasser Curious Gorge.

source: TEXT_LUCKBC003_03212_SEQ_01<tab>Curious Gorge has been training as hard as ever and has indeed grown stronger for it, yet upon seeing you for the first time in an age, he immediately recognizes that you have grown stronger still. After you regale him with tales of your adventures in the First, particularly those of Granson and Dikaiosyne, he concludes that the reason for his limited growth is love─or rather, that he has been unable to put it out of his mind. Curious Gorge has sent many missives to Dorgono in the Far East, but has yet to receive even a single reply, and so he resolves to go and see her in person...and thus is not present when Dorgono and her father Luvsan arrive moments later, having recently come all the way from the Azim Steppe to thank in person all those who aided the Qerel. Since Curious Gorge is nowhere to be found, you are to proceed to the Moraby Drydocks where Broken Mountain and his warriors can be found.
target: TEXT_LUCKBC003_03212_SEQ_01<tab>Curious Gorge a pris le chemin de la Steppe d'Azim pour rejoindre Dorgono, mais celle-ci vous a retrouvé<var 08 E905 ((e)) (()) /var> à la Chute cachée. Elle était venue avec son père, l'ancien de la tribu des Qerel, qui souhaitait vous remercier pour votre victoire sur les Chagan. Vous avez ensuite accepté d'accompagner père et fille jusqu'au chantier naval de Moraby, afin qu'ils puissent remercier les soldats du Maelstrom. Allez parler à Broken Mountain.

source: TEXT_LUCKBC003_03212_SEQ_02<tab>During the course of their conversation, Broken Mountain admits to Luvsan that he does not carry an axe because he can no longer fight. However, the elder Xaela does not believe all hope is lost, and proposes a treatment that may restore him to fighting condition. A certain type of moss will be necessary for this, and Luvsan believes he saw a suitable substitute on the way to the docks.
target: TEXT_LUCKBC003_03212_SEQ_02<tab>Luvsan, dont le cadeau de cinquante bouquetins n'a pas eu l'effet escompté, a finalement décidé de remercier Broken Moutain en le guérissant de son ancienne blessure qui l'empêche de se battre. Discutez avec Luvsan pour savoir comment il compte s'y prendre.

source: TEXT_LUCKBC003_03212_SEQ_03<tab>The moss in question can be found growing on boulders strewn throughout the general vicinity, and Luvsan bids you gather it by first shattering them with a Heavy Swing, which should render it easier to collect. If nothing else, it is inarguably a more dramatic way of gathering moss than gently scraping it off.
target: TEXT_LUCKBC003_03212_SEQ_03<tab>Luvsan vous a demandé de récolter de la <var 33 ((EventItem)) 0DF61E8EC80202 /var> pour qu'il puisse mener son rituel de guérison à bien. Brisez les <var 33 ((EObj)) 0DF61EAC250302 /var> de La Cédrière à l'aide de votre coup puissant pour récupérer la mousse qui y pousse.

source: TEXT_LUCKBC003_03212_SEQ_04<tab>You succeed in gathering the moss in the distinct warrior fashion. Luvsan should be satisfied with the quantity in your possession.
target: TEXT_LUCKBC003_03212_SEQ_04<tab>Vous avez trouvé l'ingrédient que Luvsan vous avait demandé. Allez le lui remettre.

source: TEXT_LUCKBC003_03212_SEQ_05<tab>Taking advantage of your privacy, Luvsan confesses that he had an ulterior motive for coming to Eorzea: to confirm his suspicions that his daughter had fallen in love with a warrior of the West. After meeting you, he concludes that you are the suitor in question, and offers to bless your union─at which point Dorgono returns and puts an end to the discussion for the time being.
target: TEXT_LUCKBC003_03212_SEQ_05<tab>Vous avez remis la mousse à Luvsan. Adressez-lui la parole pour commencer le rituel de guérison.

source: TEXT_LUCKBC003_03212_SEQ_06<tab>With all gathered for the ritual, Luvsan offers an elixir to Broken Mountain, who drinks deep. Finally, he instructs you to strike the injured warrior with all your might, assuring you both that it is the only way. Though Broken Mountain is understandably uncomfortable with this proposal, the die is cast, and only a Heavy Swing will suffice.
target: TEXT_LUCKBC003_03212_SEQ_06<tab>Luvsan vous a expliqué que pour guérir Broken Moutain, il faut que vous le frappiez de toutes vos forces. Assénez un coup puissant au frère de Curious Gorge.

source:
TEXT_LUCKBC003_03212_SEQ_07Broken Mountain weathers your assault, and moments later finds himself filled with newfound strength. He is a warrior reborn, and the beast within is his to command. As all celebrate his successful recovery, Curious Gorge approaches─but observing from afar, mistakes Dorgono's joyful smile as an expression of her love towards you, leading him to succumb to his inner beast and charge. Fortunately, before it turns into a needlessly messy and violent affair, she brings him to his senses with a single blow.

After Curious Gorge recovers, he apologizes for the misunderstanding, and joins in celebrating his brother's miraculous recovery. Sensing that this is the Western suitor, Luvsan silently approves, and declares that it is time to return to the Steppe─alone. Dorgono, however, is to remain in Eorzea, where she will continue to hone her skills until she is a warrior fit to be wed. Needless to say, both she and Curious Gorge are more than satisfied with this state of affairs, and together they return to Hidden Falls to begin their training together.
target: TEXT_LUCKBC003_03212_SEQ_07<tab>Vous avez réussi à guérir Broken Mountain. Curious Gorge, vous apercevant aux côtés de Dorgono, a fait une crise de jalousie qui a réveillé sa propre bête intérieure. Il a cependant été im<var 16 /var>mé<var 16 /var>dia<var 16 /var>te<var 16 /var>ment calmé par un coup de hache magistral de sa fiancée. Luvsan, ayant accompli ce qu'il était venu faire, a décidé de rentrer dans son village, en laissant sa fille sur place pour qu'elle continue son en<var 16 /var>traî<var 16 /var>ne<var 16 /var>ment. Allez retrouver Curious Gorge à la Chute cachée.

source: TEXT_LUCKBC003_03212_SEQ_08<tab>Curious Gorge reminds you not to grow complacent in your own efforts to grow stronger still, for with Broken Mountain healed and Dorgono in Eorzea for the time being, your competition for the title of the realm's greatest warrior has grown that much more intense. And indeed, the day may come when one of the three will dethrone you...but not yet.
target: TEXT_LUCKBC003_03212_SEQ_08<tab>Curious Gorge et Dorgono ont décidé de s'entraîner ensemble. Continuez à vous exercer de votre côté pour ne pas perdre votre place de numéro un.

source: TEXT_LUCKBC003_03212_TODO_00<tab>Speak with Broken Mountain in lower La Noscea.
target: TEXT_LUCKBC003_03212_TODO_00<tab>Parler à Broken Mountain, au chantier naval de Moraby

source: TEXT_LUCKBC003_03212_TODO_01<tab>Speak with Luvsan.
target: TEXT_LUCKBC003_03212_TODO_01<tab>Parler à Luvsan, à La Cédrière

source: TEXT_LUCKBC003_03212_TODO_02<tab>Use Heavy Swing on mossy boulders to obtain shivermoss.
target: TEXT_LUCKBC003_03212_TODO_02<tab>Attaquer les rochers fissurés avec un coup puissant

source: TEXT_LUCKBC003_03212_TODO_03<tab>Deliver the shivermoss to Luvsan.
target: TEXT_LUCKBC003_03212_TODO_03<tab>Remettre la musci analgesia à Luvsan

target: TEXT_LUCKBC003_03212_TODO_06<tab>Parler à Curious Gorge, à la Chute cachée

source: TEXT_LUCKBC003_03212_CURIOUSGORGE_000_000<tab>Oh, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>...how long has it been? I've been dedicating myself wholly to my training for some time now, day after day after day, but I fear my progress has come to a halt of late.
target: TEXT_LUCKBC003_03212_CURIOUSGORGE_000_000<tab>Oh, salut <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var><var 1D /var>! J'sais pas c'qui m'arrive en ce moment... J'arrive pas à m'concentrer sur mon en<var 16 /var>traî<var 16 /var>ne<var 16 /var>ment...

source: TEXT_LUCKBC003_03212_CURIOUSGORGE_000_001<tab>You look well. A fair bit stronger than I remember, even. What is your secret, my friend? How have you grown so much more powerful?
target: TEXT_LUCKBC003_03212_CURIOUSGORGE_000_001<tab>Par contre on dirait que t'as pas chômé d'ton côté<var 1D /var>! Comment tu fais pour jamais avoir de baisse de régime comme ça<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_LUCKBC003_03212_Q1_000_000<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_LUCKBC003_03212_Q1_000_000<tab>Que répondez-vous à Curious Gorge<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_LUCKBC003_03212_A1_000_001<tab>So I got sucked into this portal and traveled to another world...
target: TEXT_LUCKBC003_03212_A1_000_001<tab>Je suis allé<var 08 E905 ((e)) (()) /var> m'entraîner dans un monde parallèle.

source: TEXT_LUCKBC003_03212_A1_000_002<tab>I went toe-to-toe with this fellow called Dikaiosyne...
target: TEXT_LUCKBC003_03212_A1_000_002<tab>Je me suis battu<var 08 E905 ((e)) (()) /var> contre Dikaiosyne...

source: TEXT_LUCKBC003_03212_CURIOUSGORGE_000_002<tab>Wait, wait─ I can tell this is going to take a while. Since I've just finished my training, why don't we speak at length on dry land?
target: TEXT_LUCKBC003_03212_CURIOUSGORGE_000_002<tab>Nan mais j'comprends rien à c'que tu racontes... Ça te dérangerait de m'expliquer en détail autour d'un bon feu de camp<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_LUCKBC003_03212_CURIOUSGORGE_000_003<tab>So there are more worlds than this, eh? That's a lot to take in... And this Granson, ye gods. To see the woman you love taken from you before your very eyes... <sniffle> No wonder he struggled so mightily to pick up the pieces of his life...
target: TEXT_LUCKBC003_03212_CURIOUSGORGE_000_003<tab>Un monde parallèle... C'est difficile à croire<var 1D /var>! Mais moi, l'histoire de Granson qui veut venger la femme qu'il aime, c'est surtout ça qui m'touche...

source: TEXT_LUCKBC003_03212_CURIOUSGORGE_000_004<tab>After listening to your tale, I realize what it is I've been missing. The one thing I lack to spur me to even greater heights!
target: TEXT_LUCKBC003_03212_CURIOUSGORGE_000_004<tab>J'crois que j'ai compris pourquoi j'arrivais pas à me concentrer sur mon en<var 16 /var>traî<var 16 /var>ne<var 16 /var>ment grâce à ton récit...

source: TEXT_LUCKBC003_03212_CURIOUSGORGE_100_004<tab>'Tis love!
target: TEXT_LUCKBC003_03212_CURIOUSGORGE_100_004<tab>C'est à cause de... L'AMOUR<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKBC003_03212_CURIOUSGORGE_000_005<tab>I sent several missives to Dorgono, you see, but she has yet to respond even once! I've waited patiently, eagerly, but still! Still no word has arrived!
target: TEXT_LUCKBC003_03212_CURIOUSGORGE_000_005<tab>J'ai écrit à Dorgono ça fait un bail déjà, mais elle m'a jamais répondu, tu comprends...

source: TEXT_LUCKBC003_03212_CURIOUSGORGE_000_006<tab>Fear has crept into my heart. Has she forgotten me? Has she met another!?
target: TEXT_LUCKBC003_03212_CURIOUSGORGE_000_006<tab>Tu crois qu'elle m'a oublié<var 1D /var>? Ou encore pire, qu'elle s'est trouvé quelqu'un d'autre<var 1D /var>!?

source: TEXT_LUCKBC003_03212_CURIOUSGORGE_000_007<tab>I cannot rest until I know the reason for her delay! I must know! This is no time for training!
target: TEXT_LUCKBC003_03212_CURIOUSGORGE_000_007<tab>J'peux pas rester ici les bras croisés<var 1D /var>! J'veux en avoir le cœur net<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKBC003_03212_CURIOUSGORGE_000_008<tab>Nor can I afford to be patient. Granson's time with his beloved was cut short─who is to say ours will not be as well? Or worse, if it already has...
target: TEXT_LUCKBC003_03212_CURIOUSGORGE_000_008<tab>Cette histoire d'amour qu'tu m'as racontée, ça m'a ouvert les yeux, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. Si ça s'trouve il est arrivé quelque chose à Dorgono<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKBC003_03212_CURIOUSGORGE_000_009<tab>It is decided! I will purchase passage on the next ship for the Far East and return to the Azim Steppe with all haste! I'm coming, Dorgono!
target: TEXT_LUCKBC003_03212_CURIOUSGORGE_000_009<tab>Faut que j'aille tout de suite à la Steppe d'Azim<var 1D /var>! J'arrive, Dorgono<var 1D /var>!!

source: TEXT_LUCKBC003_03212_DORGONO_000_010<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, how fortunate you are here! I have been looking all over for Curious Gorge. The Marauders' Guild told me he trained near here, but I did not know you did as well!
target: TEXT_LUCKBC003_03212_DORGONO_000_010<tab>Tiens, mais c'est <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var><var 1D /var>! La guilde des maraudeurs m'a prévenue que Gorge m'attendrait, j'avoue que tomber sur vous me surprend<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKBC003_03212_DORGONO_000_011<tab>What do you mean he's going to the Steppe to see me because I never answered any of his missives? Is this a joke?
target: TEXT_LUCKBC003_03212_DORGONO_000_011<tab>Gorge est allé à ma rencontre dans la Steppe d'Azim...<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_LUCKBC003_03212_DORGONO_000_012<tab>No matter how many he sent, I would have never responded. Our people have no written tongue. Whatever reached us was probably fed to the goats. Anyway─let us hope that someone informs him of our arrival before he gets on a ship...
target: TEXT_LUCKBC003_03212_DORGONO_000_012<tab>J'ai reçu sa lettre, mais on sait pas lire, nous autres Qerel... Les bouquetins ont bien apprécié la mâchouiller par contre... Bon, c'est pas grave, il est pas parti pour toujours, va.

source: TEXT_LUCKBC003_03212_DORGONO_000_013<tab>As for why I have traveled all this way, it was at the behest of my father, who wished to thank you and Curious Gorge personally for fighting on our behalf.
target: TEXT_LUCKBC003_03212_DORGONO_000_013<tab>Le plus ironique dans tout ça c'est que l'ancien de mon village m'a précisément donné comme mission de venir en Éorzéa et de vous ramener chez nous avec Gorge<var 1D /var>! C'est pour ça que je suis ici<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKBC003_03212_LUVSAN_000_014<tab>I am Luvsan of the Qerel, and you are <var 29 EB02 /var>─the khagan who stood with my people against the Chaghan.
target: TEXT_LUCKBC003_03212_LUVSAN_000_014<tab>Bonjour, <var 08 E905 ((chère)) ((cher)) /var> aventuri<var 08 E905 ((ère)) ((er)) /var>, je m'appelle Luvsan. C'est donc vous que je dois remercier pour nous avoir débarassés des Chagan.

source: TEXT_LUCKBC003_03212_LUVSAN_000_015<tab>But that is not all, for you also helped my youngest daughter gain control over the will of Karash. No words can express the depth of my gratitude to you.
target: TEXT_LUCKBC003_03212_LUVSAN_000_015<tab>Ma fille m'a également rapporté que vous l'aviez aidée à vaincre sa bête intérieure. Je ne sais comment vous remercier.

source: TEXT_LUCKBC003_03212_DORGONO_000_016<tab>You promised not to speak of Karash...
target: TEXT_LUCKBC003_03212_DORGONO_000_016<tab>On avait dit qu'on parlait pas de notre lien de parenté<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKBC003_03212_LUVSAN_000_017<tab>But I must. My heart broke when she was marked as Taken and exiled. Never again would I see her, I feared. But then she returned! Blood of my blood, master of Karash! My little girl...and it is all because of you.
target: TEXT_LUCKBC003_03212_LUVSAN_000_017<tab>Devoir interdire à ma fille de revenir parmi nous fut la décision la plus difficile que j'aie eu à prendre de toute ma vie. Mais grâce à vous, Dorgono ne pose plus aucun danger, et a pu revenir vivre au village.

source: TEXT_LUCKBC003_03212_LUVSAN_000_018<tab>In thanks for your deeds, I wish to present to you thirty horses─
target: TEXT_LUCKBC003_03212_LUVSAN_000_018<tab>Pour vous montrer ma gratitude, je voudrais vous offrir trente chevaux<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKBC003_03212_DORGONO_000_019<tab>Father, no! It is not the way of Eorzea to give horses as thanks! And besides, <var 08 E905 ((she)) ((he)) /var> is a traveler! They would only be a burden!
target: TEXT_LUCKBC003_03212_DORGONO_000_019<tab>Non mais qu'est-ce que tu veux qu'<var 08 E905 ((elle)) ((il)) /var> fiche avec trente chevaux en Éorzéa<var 1D /var>!?

source: TEXT_LUCKBC003_03212_LUVSAN_000_020<tab>I apologize, khagan. Now then─I must also express my gratitude to the others. Warriors of the Maelstrom, were they? I believe I recall the way...
target: TEXT_LUCKBC003_03212_LUVSAN_000_020<tab>Allons-y, Dorgono. Nous devons aussi aller remercier les soldats du Maelstrom, qui t'ont prise sous leur aile.

source: TEXT_LUCKBC003_03212_DORGONO_000_021<tab>If you have the time to spare, might you accompany us? Having traveled so long solely in the company of my father, I am finding him increasingly exhausting...
target: TEXT_LUCKBC003_03212_DORGONO_000_021<tab>Euh... Désolée de vous demander ça, mais ça m'arrangerait si vous pouviez venir avec nous... J'ai pas tellement envie d'être toute seule avec mon père...

source: TEXT_LUCKBC003_03212_LUVSAN_000_026<tab>Well do I know how difficult my daughter can be, and so I wish to present you with a gift as an expression of my gratitude. I am told you would have no use for horses, but what about fifty goats?
target: TEXT_LUCKBC003_03212_LUVSAN_000_026<tab>Dites, si ces trente chevaux vous encombrent, je peux vous proposer cinquante bouquetins plutôt<var 1D /var>! Qu'est-ce que vous préférez<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_LUCKBC003_03212_DORGONO_000_027<tab>It brings me joy to see the Lominsan warriors in good health!
target: TEXT_LUCKBC003_03212_DORGONO_000_027<tab>Ah, vous voilà<var 1D /var>! Tout le monde a l'air d'être en forme<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKBC003_03212_WARRIOR02902_000_028<tab>Gorge's got good taste, aye. If it weren't for him, I'd have a mind to...er...give a polite and wholly appropriate compliment and be on my way.
target: TEXT_LUCKBC003_03212_WARRIOR02902_000_028<tab>O-oh bonjour<var 1D /var>! D-Dorgono est toujours aussi jolie, vous ne trouvez pas...<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_LUCKBC003_03212_BROKENMOUNTAIN_000_030<tab>It is a pleasure to see you again, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, as well as Dorgono. I am surprised to see her as you doubtless are, and in the company of her father besides...
target: TEXT_LUCKBC003_03212_BROKENMOUNTAIN_000_030<tab>Tiens, tu es là aussi, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var><var 1D /var>! Si je m'attendais à recevoir la visite du père de Dorgono...

source: TEXT_LUCKBC003_03212_LUVSAN_000_031<tab>...I must insist that you accept a small token of my appreciation. I do not doubt my daughter was quite the handful. No less than fifty goats, I think, should suffice for the imposition─
target: TEXT_LUCKBC003_03212_LUVSAN_000_031<tab>Je suis venu vous remercier d'avoir pris soin de ma fille pendant son exil. Je vous prie d'accepter ce modeste présent de cinquante bouquetins en gage de recon<var 16 /var>nais<var 16 /var>san<var 16 /var>ce.

source: TEXT_LUCKBC003_03212_DORGONO_000_032<tab>Fifty goats would be a far greater imposition, Father!
target: TEXT_LUCKBC003_03212_DORGONO_000_032<tab>Mais arrête de vouloir refiler tes bestiaux à tout le monde<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKBC003_03212_BROKENMOUNTAIN_000_033<tab>It really was no bother, sir. A pleasure, honestly─and a regrettably short one at that. So much so that we were hoping we might see her again, so you can imagine our surprise and our delight when you arrived.
target: TEXT_LUCKBC003_03212_BROKENMOUNTAIN_000_033<tab>Nous ne voyons pas souvent de guerriers aussi doués que Dorgono<var 1D /var>! Même si son séjour parmi nous fut très bref, elle nous a été d'une très grande aide<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKBC003_03212_LUVSAN_000_034<tab>If not horses or goats, then... Wait. Are you not the leaders of these warriors? Yet you do not carry an axe. Why is this?
target: TEXT_LUCKBC003_03212_LUVSAN_000_034<tab>Je m'excuse de vous poser cette question peut-être déplacée, mais pourquoi un instructeur du Maelstrom tel que vous ne porte-t-il pas de hache<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_LUCKBC003_03212_BROKENMOUNTAIN_000_035<tab>That is...that is because I cannot. Not since I was defeated by mine own brother in battle. He had succumbed to his inner beast─your Karash─and struck a blow with such ferocity from which I have never fully recovered.
target: TEXT_LUCKBC003_03212_BROKENMOUNTAIN_000_035<tab>Eh bien, c'est parce qu'il y a longtemps j'ai perdu un combat contre mon frère qui était sous l'emprise de sa bête intérieure... Ou possédé par un esprit malin, si vous préférez.

source: TEXT_LUCKBC003_03212_BROKENMOUNTAIN_000_036<tab>But it is well that he did, for I too was in thrall to the beast at the time. Had he not given it his all, countless innocents may have died by my hand...
target: TEXT_LUCKBC003_03212_BROKENMOUNTAIN_000_036<tab>J'étais moi-même possédé à ce moment-là, mais j'en ai quand même gardé des séquelles qui m'empêchent de me battre encore aujourd'hui.

source: TEXT_LUCKBC003_03212_LUVSAN_000_037<tab>It is not an unfamiliar story. Many a Qerel has suffered a grievous injury which rendered them unable to fight.
target: TEXT_LUCKBC003_03212_LUVSAN_000_037<tab>Je comprends... Chez les Qerel aussi, nous avions des anciens combattants incapables de se battre après un violent traumatisme...

source: TEXT_LUCKBC003_03212_LUVSAN_000_038<tab>But I am a boo─a healer, and I can help you to wield your axe once more.
target: TEXT_LUCKBC003_03212_LUVSAN_000_038<tab>Cependant, grâce à mes con<var 16 /var>nais<var 16 /var>san<var 16 /var>ces de guérisseur, j'ai pu leur rendre leurs capacités et les remettre com<var 16 /var>plè<var 16 /var>te<var 16 /var>ment sur pied<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKBC003_03212_BROKENMOUNTAIN_000_039<tab>This is in your power? I...I did not think it was possible!
target: TEXT_LUCKBC003_03212_BROKENMOUNTAIN_000_039<tab>Vous pouvez faire ça<var 1D /var>!? V-vous pourriez m'en dire un peu plus<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_LUCKBC003_03212_LUVSAN_000_040<tab>It pains me to see a warrior who yet yearns to fight but cannot. Allow me to treat you as repayment for your kindness.
target: TEXT_LUCKBC003_03212_LUVSAN_000_040<tab>Puisque mes bouquetins n'ont pas le succès attendu, j'espère que vous accepterez que je vous soumette à mon rituel de guérison. Je vous dois bien ça après ce que vous avez fait pour ma fille.

source: TEXT_LUCKBC003_03212_BROKENMOUNTAIN_000_041<tab>Full glad am I to accept! Thank you, sir, thank you...
target: TEXT_LUCKBC003_03212_BROKENMOUNTAIN_000_041<tab>A-a-avec grand plaisir<var 1D /var>!!

source: TEXT_LUCKBC003_03212_LUVSAN_000_042<tab>This treatment requires a quantity of shivermoss. While it is not native to your land, I believe a similar type grows here. Let us go and gather some.
target: TEXT_LUCKBC003_03212_LUVSAN_000_042<tab>En chemin, j'ai repéré de la <var 33 ((EventItem)) 0DF61E8EC80202 /var>, une variété de mousse végétale in<var 16 /var>dis<var 16 /var>pen<var 16 /var>sa<var 16 /var>ble à votre guérison. Commençons par en récolter.

source: TEXT_LUCKBC003_03212_BROKENMOUNTAIN_000_043<tab>You lot return to your training for now.
target: TEXT_LUCKBC003_03212_BROKENMOUNTAIN_000_043<tab>Soldats, retournez à votre en<var 16 /var>traî<var 16 /var>ne<var 16 /var>ment<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKBC003_03212_BROKENMOUNTAIN_100_044<tab>I don't know about you, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, but I'm bloody excited!
target: TEXT_LUCKBC003_03212_BROKENMOUNTAIN_100_044<tab> Les autres, suivez-moi<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKBC003_03212_DORGONO_000_046<tab>Do you have any siblings, khagan? I am youngest of eighteen myself...
target: TEXT_LUCKBC003_03212_DORGONO_000_046<tab>Je me demande ce que font mes dix-sept frères et sœurs en ce moment... Vous êtes enfant unique, vous<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_LUCKBC003_03212_LUVSAN_000_050<tab>The moss of which I spoke I spied in this place not long ago. We will need a moderate amount for the ritual to heal Broken Mountain. You and Dorgono can both assist me in this.
target: TEXT_LUCKBC003_03212_LUVSAN_000_050<tab>Il y a beaucoup de <var 33 ((EventItem)) 0DF61E8EC80202 /var> sur les rochers dans ce coin. Broken Moutain et moi-même allons préparer le nécessaire pour le rituel de guérison, je vous laisse donc le soin de ramasser la mousse, tou<var 08 E905 ((tes)) ((s)) /var> les deux.

source: TEXT_LUCKBC003_03212_LUVSAN_000_051<tab>Look for mossy rocks nearby and shatter them with a Heavy Swing, then gather up the shivermoss.
target: TEXT_LUCKBC003_03212_LUVSAN_000_051<tab>Pour la trouver facilement, je vous conseille d'aller briser les <var 33 ((EObj)) 0DF61EAC250302 /var>, car c'est dans les crevasses que cette plante pousse.

source: TEXT_LUCKBC003_03212_DORGONO_000_052<tab>Ah, I remember this game! The marauders were always breaking rocks to hone their skills. This will be easy!
target: TEXT_LUCKBC003_03212_DORGONO_000_052<tab>Tout ça me rappelle l'époque où je faisais partie de la guilde des maraudeurs... Allez, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, allons casser des cailloux<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKBC003_03212_SYSTEM_100_053<tab>Use Heavy Swing on mossy boulders to obtain shivermoss.
target: TEXT_LUCKBC003_03212_SYSTEM_100_053<tab>Brisez des <var 33 ((EObj)) 0DF61EAC250302 /var> à l'aide de <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Coup puissant<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> afin d'obtenir la mousse dont a besoin Luvsan.

source: TEXT_LUCKBC003_03212_LUVSAN_000_056<tab>To be fair, you need not actually shatter the rocks to gather the moss, but it hastens the process and makes a somewhat dull process a little more entertaining, do you not think?
target: TEXT_LUCKBC003_03212_LUVSAN_000_056<tab>J'ai besoin que Dorgono et vous m'apportiez toute la mousse que vous pourrez trouver. Démolissez les rochers fissurés pour aller plus vite<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKBC003_03212_LUVSAN_000_060<tab>You wield your axe with great skill, khagan. May I have the shivermoss?
target: TEXT_LUCKBC003_03212_LUVSAN_000_060<tab>Vous avez pu vous procurer ce que je vous ai demandé<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_LUCKBC003_03212_LUVSAN_000_061<tab>Very good. Now, before my daughter returns, there is one other matter which I must discuss with you.
target: TEXT_LUCKBC003_03212_LUVSAN_000_061<tab>Merci beaucoup<var 1D /var>! Au passage, je me demandais si je pouvais vous demander quelques conseils, concernant ma fille... Auriez-vous un peu de temps à m'accorder<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_LUCKBC003_03212_LUVSAN_000_062<tab>She is a woman grown, and as her father I must think of her future. Of marriage.
target: TEXT_LUCKBC003_03212_LUVSAN_000_062<tab>Dorgono est ma petite dernière, mais elle est finalement en âge de se marier maintenant. En tant que parent, je m'inquiète de voir qu'elle n'ait toujours pas trouvé de bon parti, vous comprenez.

source: TEXT_LUCKBC003_03212_LUVSAN_000_063<tab>Alas, she has shown no interest in any warriors of the Qerel. At first I thought none suited her, but then I began to wonder...was her mind made up? Had she already chosen a suitor?
target: TEXT_LUCKBC003_03212_LUVSAN_000_063<tab>Elle ne montre aucun intérêt pour ses compagnons Qerel... Je me disais qu'elle avait peut-être déjà quelqu'un en vue...

source: TEXT_LUCKBC003_03212_LUVSAN_000_064<tab>Realizing this, I persuaded her to come with me to Eorzea. And now that we have met, I feel more certain than ever. Dorgono has fallen in love with a warrior of another land...
target: TEXT_LUCKBC003_03212_LUVSAN_000_064<tab>Et puis j'ai compris<var 1D /var>! Lorsque j'ai vu comment ma fille vous regardait, j'ai réalisé que la personne qui l'intéressait se trouvait devant moi<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKBC003_03212_LUVSAN_000_065<tab>...And I could not be happier for her. For who could disapprove of the champion who stood against the Chaghan?
target: TEXT_LUCKBC003_03212_LUVSAN_000_065<tab>Ch<var 08 E905 ((ère)) ((er)) /var> <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, vous qui avez prouvé votre valeur face aux Chagan...

source: TEXT_LUCKBC003_03212_LUVSAN_000_066<tab><var 29 EB02 /var>, khagan of the Steppe, I will not oppose the union of you and Dorgono. I offer you my blessing.
target: TEXT_LUCKBC003_03212_LUVSAN_000_066<tab>Je vous offre la main de ma fille<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKBC003_03212_Q2_000_000<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_LUCKBC003_03212_Q2_000_000<tab>Que répondez-vous<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_LUCKBC003_03212_A2_000_001<tab>My heart belongs to the sea.
target: TEXT_LUCKBC003_03212_A2_000_001<tab>Euh je peux pas j'ai poney.

source: TEXT_LUCKBC003_03212_A2_000_002<tab>Did I mention I'm eternally bonded to someone else?
target: TEXT_LUCKBC003_03212_A2_000_002<tab>J'ai déjà un lien éternel avec quelqu'un d'autre...

source: TEXT_LUCKBC003_03212_A2_000_003<tab>Honestly I'm not all that keen on the whole institution of marriage...
target: TEXT_LUCKBC003_03212_A2_000_003<tab>Je suis amoureu<var 08 E905 ((se)) ((x)) /var> de Broken Mountain<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKBC003_03212_A2_000_004<tab>So there's this bloke called Gorge...
target: TEXT_LUCKBC003_03212_A2_000_004<tab>Gorge risquerait de faire une attaque...

source: TEXT_LUCKBC003_03212_A2_000_005<tab>Don't mind if I do!
target: TEXT_LUCKBC003_03212_A2_000_005<tab>Avec joie<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKBC003_03212_DORGONO_000_067<tab>Hey! HEY! Who are you to decide such things for me!?
target: TEXT_LUCKBC003_03212_DORGONO_000_067<tab>Hé ho<var 1D /var>! Je ne suis pas le premier prix d'une tombola<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKBC003_03212_DORGONO_000_068<tab>I will not marry <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! I have already chosen a suitor, and it is not <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((him)) /var>!
target: TEXT_LUCKBC003_03212_DORGONO_000_068<tab>Et puis si tu veux vraiment savoir, je suis déjà fiancée... et c'est pas à <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var><var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKBC003_03212_LUVSAN_000_069<tab>Oh! I see... I was so certain that... Ahem. So...who is this other...?
target: TEXT_LUCKBC003_03212_LUVSAN_000_069<tab>A-ah bon<var 1D /var>? Et tu comptais m'en parler quand<var 1D /var>? On peut savoir avec qui, alors<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_LUCKBC003_03212_DORGONO_000_070<tab>We will not discuss this any further! We have the moss, now let us go and prepare for the ritual!
target: TEXT_LUCKBC003_03212_DORGONO_000_070<tab>C'est pas le moment de parler de ça<var 1D /var>! Je t'ai ramené ta précieuse <var 33 ((EventItem)) 0DF61E8EC80202 /var>, alors à toi de t'occuper du rituel de guérison maintenant<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKBC003_03212_LUVSAN_000_071<tab>Pray forgive me, khagan. I spoke out of turn. Dorgono is right─we should attend to the ritual and restore Broken Mountain to the warrior he was.
target: TEXT_LUCKBC003_03212_LUVSAN_000_071<tab>Bon... Ben... Veuillez oublier cette histoire, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>... Allons retrouver Broken Mountain.

source: TEXT_LUCKBC003_03212_DORGONO_000_076<tab>I'm so sorry he spoke to you like that. It is a bad habit of his, meddling in affairs that are not his concern...
target: TEXT_LUCKBC003_03212_DORGONO_000_076<tab>J'arrive pas à croire que mon père voulait m'offrir comme un vulgaire bouquetin...

source: TEXT_LUCKBC003_03212_BROKENMOUNTAIN_000_077<tab>I know not what sort of ritual this is. Do you? The traditions of the Qerel are a complete and utter mystery to me...
target: TEXT_LUCKBC003_03212_BROKENMOUNTAIN_000_077<tab>J'ai hâte de voir les résultats du rituel<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKBC003_03212_LUVSAN_000_080<tab>I have brewed an elixir using the moss. Drink it now.
target: TEXT_LUCKBC003_03212_LUVSAN_000_080<tab>Avant de commencer, j'ai fait une infusion avec la <var 33 ((EventItem)) 0DF61E8EC80202 /var> que j'ai fait boire à notre ami.

source: TEXT_LUCKBC003_03212_LUVSAN_000_081<tab>Very good. Your body is ready. You must now receive of the power of another great warrior. I can think of none more suitable than you, khagan.
target: TEXT_LUCKBC003_03212_LUVSAN_000_081<tab>Pour que je puisse mener à bien la cérémonie, il me faut l'aide d'un guerrier solide. <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, vous ferez par<var 16 /var>fai<var 16 /var>te<var 16 /var>ment l'affaire<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKBC003_03212_LUVSAN_000_082<tab>We must awaken the Karash within him once more. I bid you summon the strength of Father Azim and strike Broken Mountain with all your might!
target: TEXT_LUCKBC003_03212_LUVSAN_000_082<tab>Pour réveiller la bête intérieure de Broken Moutain, j'ai besoin que vous lui mettiez un bon gros coup, de toutes vos forces.

source: TEXT_LUCKBC003_03212_BROKENMOUNTAIN_000_083<tab>You bid <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((him)) /var> what now!?
target: TEXT_LUCKBC003_03212_BROKENMOUNTAIN_000_083<tab>P-pardon<var 1D /var>? V-vous êtes sûr<var 1D /var>? Non parce que ça a l'air plutôt radical comme méthode là...

source: TEXT_LUCKBC003_03212_LUVSAN_000_084<tab><var 1A 02 /var>All your might<var 1A 01 /var>! Hold nothing back! Swing to kill! Anything less and he will be crippled worse or die!
target: TEXT_LUCKBC003_03212_LUVSAN_000_084<tab>Ça ne marchera pas si vous n'y mettez pas toute votre force... Allez-y, ne vous retenez pas<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKBC003_03212_SYSTEM_100_085<tab>Muster all your strength and attack Broken Mountain with a Heavy Swing.
target: TEXT_LUCKBC003_03212_SYSTEM_100_085<tab>Frappez Broken Mountain de toutes vos forces avec <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Coup puissant<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>.

source: TEXT_LUCKBC003_03212_LUVSAN_000_086<tab>Do not hesitate, khagan! Strike him down as you would your most hated enemy, else this treatment will end in failure.
target: TEXT_LUCKBC003_03212_LUVSAN_000_086<tab>Ça ne marchera pas si vous n'y mettez pas toute votre force... Allez-y, ne vous retenez pas<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKBC003_03212_DORGONO_000_087<tab>Do it, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! Do it!
target: TEXT_LUCKBC003_03212_DORGONO_000_087<tab>Allez-y franco <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var><var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKBC003_03212_BROKENMOUNTAIN_000_088<tab>This seems like the exact opposite of what would benefit me...
target: TEXT_LUCKBC003_03212_BROKENMOUNTAIN_000_088<tab>At-attendez<var 1D /var>!!! Je suis pas prêt<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKBC003_03212_BROKENMOUNTAIN_100_090<tab>Ugh!
target: TEXT_LUCKBC003_03212_BROKENMOUNTAIN_100_090<tab>Ourf...<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKBC003_03212_BROKENMOUNTAIN_000_100<tab>Seven hells, what is this...this feeling I feel welling up from deep within? This fire, this passion...this rage!
target: TEXT_LUCKBC003_03212_BROKENMOUNTAIN_000_100<tab>J-je me sens tout bizarre<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKBC003_03212_BROKENMOUNTAIN_000_101<tab>The beast stirs again! Its power is mine! It fills me with strength, yet I remain in control! Huzzah!
target: TEXT_LUCKBC003_03212_BROKENMOUNTAIN_000_101<tab>Oooh, je sens que ma bête intérieure s'est réveillée<var 1D /var>! Je me sens tellement... puissant<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKBC003_03212_LUVSAN_000_102<tab>The strength never left you, my friend. The injury was not one of the flesh, but of the heart. Trickery of the mind, a deception of the self.
target: TEXT_LUCKBC003_03212_LUVSAN_000_102<tab>On dirait que ça a fonctionné<var 1D /var>! Ce n'est pas votre blessure qui vous empêchait de vous battre, c'est la peur qui découlait de votre défaite<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKBC003_03212_LUVSAN_000_103<tab>The elixir served only to steel your flesh and dull the pain, so you could stand fast against the khagan's axe. You will not need it again, for the fear that held you hostage has fled.
target: TEXT_LUCKBC003_03212_LUVSAN_000_103<tab>La tisane que je vous ai fait boire a servi à endormir la douleur, et le coup violent de <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> à éradiquer ce sentiment de peur qui vous rongeait.

source: TEXT_LUCKBC003_03212_BROKENMOUNTAIN_000_104<tab>I see... It was in my head all this time. It's no secret that fear can cripple a man worse than any wound, but I never thought... Gods, what a fool I've been.
target: TEXT_LUCKBC003_03212_BROKENMOUNTAIN_000_104<tab>Je vois... Et moi qui pensais que mon état était dû à un problème physique... Alors que finalement c'était seulement une manifestation de la faiblesse de mon cœur.

source: TEXT_LUCKBC003_03212_BROKENMOUNTAIN_000_105<tab>Thank you so much for helping me to overcome my foolishness, Luvsan. You've made me a warrior again!
target: TEXT_LUCKBC003_03212_BROKENMOUNTAIN_000_105<tab>Si on m'avait dit qu'un jour je pourrais de nouveau tenir une hache<var 1D /var>! Je vous serai éter<var 16 /var>nel<var 16 /var>le<var 16 /var>ment re<var 16 /var>con<var 16 /var>nais<var 16 /var>sant, Luvsan<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKBC003_03212_LUVSAN_000_106<tab>Thank <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((him)) /var>, for a warrior of surpassing strength and power is indispensable for this ritual. No other could have served as well.
target: TEXT_LUCKBC003_03212_LUVSAN_000_106<tab>Vous devriez plutôt remercier <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>... Seul<var 08 E905 ((e)) (()) /var> un<var 08 E905 ((e)) (()) /var> guerri<var 08 E905 ((ère)) ((er)) /var> de son envergure était capable de porter un coup assez puissant pour réveiller la bête intérieure des personnes dont le cœur est rongé par l'angoisse.

source: TEXT_LUCKBC003_03212_DORGONO_000_107<tab>Aye, for there is no greater warrior than <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>!
target: TEXT_LUCKBC003_03212_DORGONO_000_107<tab>C'est parce que <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> est l<var 08 E905 ((a)) ((e)) /var> meilleur<var 08 E905 ((e)) (()) /var><var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKBC003_03212_CURIOUSGORGE_000_108<tab>How could you, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>...? You and Dorgono, all this time... It all makes sense now. The letters, the silence. It was you...
target: TEXT_LUCKBC003_03212_CURIOUSGORGE_000_108<tab>Dorgono... <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>... Je vois... Vous avez l'air de très bien vous entendre tou<var 08 E905 ((tes)) ((s)) /var> les deux... C'est donc pour ça que t'as pas répondu à ma lettre...

source: TEXT_LUCKBC003_03212_DORGONO_000_109<tab>Curious Gorge, what is this nonsense you speak? What's gotten into you?
target: TEXT_LUCKBC003_03212_DORGONO_000_109<tab>Tiens, salut Gorge<var 1D /var>! Qu'est-ce que tu baragouines dans ton coin<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_LUCKBC003_03212_CURIOUSGORGE_000_110<tab>Graaaghhh! Gaaarrrghhh!
target: TEXT_LUCKBC003_03212_CURIOUSGORGE_000_110<tab>GRROOooOOOAAaaAAAaaaRRRrrrR<var 1D /var>!!!!

source: TEXT_LUCKBC003_03212_DORGONO_000_111<tab>Oh no you don't, you stupid fool!
target: TEXT_LUCKBC003_03212_DORGONO_000_111<tab>Calme-toi Gorge<var 1D /var>!! Mais qu'est-ce qui t'arrive<var 1D /var>!?

source: TEXT_LUCKBC003_03212_CURIOUSGORGE_000_120<tab>I am so sorry, everyone. When I went to the docks to find a ship bound for the Far East, I ran into some marauders who told me Dorgono and her father had come.
target: TEXT_LUCKBC003_03212_CURIOUSGORGE_000_120<tab>D-désolé... J'crois que j'me suis laissé un peu emporter. Quand j'ai pris le bateau pour la Steppe d'Azim, j'ai croisé des membres de la guilde des maraudeurs qui m'ont dit que Dorgono était dans le coin.

source: TEXT_LUCKBC003_03212_CURIOUSGORGE_000_121<tab>So overcome by joy I began searching for them at once, but when I finally found you here, and saw how you looked on <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> with such joy, all my earlier fears came rushing back, and the beast within me seized control...
target: TEXT_LUCKBC003_03212_CURIOUSGORGE_000_121<tab>Du coup j'l'ai cherchée partout, et quand j'ai fini par la trouver je suis tombé sur vous deux... En train de batifoler... J'ai vu rouge<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKBC003_03212_DORGONO_000_122<tab>It had better not happen again! You're lucky I held back. Next time I won't!
target: TEXT_LUCKBC003_03212_DORGONO_000_122<tab>Non mais n'importe quoi<var 1D /var>! “Batifoler”... Et pis quoi encore<var 1D /var>!? J'te préviens<var 1D /var>! La prochaine fois que tu te laisses posséder par les esprits maléfiques je te le pardonnerai pas<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKBC003_03212_CURIOUSGORGE_000_123<tab>And Brother! Is it true that you have fully recovered? You are a warrior reborn? Congratulations! It is like a dream come true!
target: TEXT_LUCKBC003_03212_CURIOUSGORGE_000_123<tab>J'arrive pas à croire que mon frère soit guéri<var 1D /var>! J'suis super content<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKBC003_03212_BROKENMOUNTAIN_000_124<tab>Indeed, Brother, indeed! At first I struggled to believe it, but it is as Luvsan says! I must go and join in the training sessions at once. And do not fear─the beast will not claim me again!
target: TEXT_LUCKBC003_03212_BROKENMOUNTAIN_000_124<tab>Et pourtant c'est la réalité<var 1D /var>! Je peux pas rester là sans rien faire, je vais de ce pas participer à l'en<var 16 /var>traî<var 16 /var>ne<var 16 /var>ment des soldats<var 1D /var>! J'ai envie de mettre ma bête intérieure à l'épreuve<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKBC003_03212_CURIOUSGORGE_000_125<tab>I cannot thank you enough, Luvsan. It has been longer than I can remember since my brother smiled so. You've given us such a gift...
target: TEXT_LUCKBC003_03212_CURIOUSGORGE_000_125<tab>Tout ça c'est grâce à vous, Luvsan<var 1D /var>! Merci<var 1D /var>! C'est la première fois qu'j'vois mon frère aussi heureux<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKBC003_03212_LUVSAN_000_126<tab>It is the least I could do after all you have done for my daughter. Thank you for your kindness and your hospitality. Our time is short, however, and we must be on our way...
target: TEXT_LUCKBC003_03212_LUVSAN_000_126<tab>Mais je vous en prie<var 1D /var>! Ce n'est rien du tout par rapport à ce que vous avez fait pour Dorgono... Bon, eh bien, veuillez m'excuser, mais je crois qu'il est temps que je rentre au village.

source: TEXT_LUCKBC003_03212_DORGONO_000_127<tab>Having said that... Dorgono. I am reminded that you are still young and want for experience. You are not yet a warrior fit to wed, and so I bid you continue to strengthen your body and mind here, in this land. It suits you, I think.
target: TEXT_LUCKBC003_03212_DORGONO_000_127<tab>Dorgono, tu as encore beaucoup à apprendre. En tant que guerrière, mais également en tant que femme. Tu n'es pas encore prête à te marier. Je souhaite donc que tu restes avec Curious Gorge, et que vous vous entraîniez ensemble.

source: TEXT_LUCKBC003_03212_DORGONO_000_128<tab>Did you hear that? I can stay! We can even train together─I can show you all the techniques we Qerel use to hone our skills!
target: TEXT_LUCKBC003_03212_DORGONO_000_128<tab>T'as entendu, Gorge<var 1D /var>? Prépare-toi à subir mes assauts, ah ah ah<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKBC003_03212_CURIOUSGORGE_000_129<tab>Aye, but first I must teach you my methods! You must come with me to Hidden Falls, right this instant!
target: TEXT_LUCKBC003_03212_CURIOUSGORGE_000_129<tab>Pfff, c'est c'qu'on va voir<var 1D /var>! Retournons à la Chute cachée et on verra qui est le plus fort<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKBC003_03212_CURIOUSGORGE_000_130<tab>You too, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! I've a few final words I wish to say to you there.
target: TEXT_LUCKBC003_03212_CURIOUSGORGE_000_130<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, viens avec nous<var 1D /var>! J'ai une révélation à t'faire<var 1D /var>!!

source: TEXT_LUCKBC003_03212_DORGONO_000_136<tab>
target: TEXT_LUCKBC003_03212_DORGONO_000_136<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_LUCKBC003_03212_CURIOUSGORGE_000_140<tab>I trust you understand what all this means, my friend. Now that my brother has taken up the axe again, the competition for the title of Eorzea's greatest warrior will be that much more intense!
target: TEXT_LUCKBC003_03212_CURIOUSGORGE_000_140<tab>C'que j'voulais te dire, c'est que maintenant que mon frère est de nouveau capable de se battre, ça t'fait un rival de plus pour la place d<var 08 E905 ((e la)) ((u)) /var> meilleur<var 08 E905 ((e)) (()) /var> guerri<var 08 E905 ((ère)) ((er)) /var><var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKBC003_03212_DORGONO_000_141<tab>Don't forget I'm in the running too, you know!
target: TEXT_LUCKBC003_03212_DORGONO_000_141<tab>Gorge a raison<var 1D /var>! Moi aussi je vise votre place hé hé<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKBC003_03212_CURIOUSGORGE_000_142<tab>So keep at it, warrior, for the time will come when we challenge you again!
target: TEXT_LUCKBC003_03212_CURIOUSGORGE_000_142<tab>Donc t'as pas intérêt à arrêter d't'entraîner, tu vois c'que j'veux dire<var 1D /var>? C'est pas drôle si c'est trop facile<var 1D /var>!
